text: Athaba apanara kona sonara tairi grha habe athaba apani akase arohana karabena ebam amara apanara akase arohanake kakhana'o bisbasa karabana, ye paryanta na apani abatirna karena amadera prati eka grantha, ya amara patha karaba. Balunah pabitra mahana amara palanakarta, ekajana manaba, ekajana rasula bai ami ke
